name: Moon shot (X-Race)
description:
---ABOUT---
You have 2 minutes and three lives to score as many points you can in this arcade style space shooter.

---CONTROLS---
- Fly with directional or WASD
- Shoot lasers with the 'A' Button but watch your ammo bar.
- Shoot missiles with the 'B' Button if your ship is purple you have missiles to shoot if its blue you are all out.

---GAMEPLAY---
Lasers only hurt aliens and missiles only hurt asteroids.
You start with 20 laser ammo and 3 missiles and regenerate some every 5 seconds.
Green aliens give 10 points
Asteroids give 10 points
Purple aliens give 50 points

---POWERUPS---
Shooting all aliens may drop laser ammo you need to fly over this to collect it shooting it will destroy it without giving you a power up.
Shooting green aliens may also drop speed up and speed down powerups you can shoot or fly over these to collect them 
Shooting purple aliens may also drop time boost powerups you can shoot or fly over these to add 5 seconds to the time bar
Shooting the asteroids may drop bombs or rocket ammo.
You can shoot or fly over bombs to destroy everything on screen and collect huge points. 
If you fly over rockets it will add 1 rocket to your ammo if you shoot it you will destroy all enemies on screen however you will not get any points for it.
